00005  *            aligned_alloc.h

00007  *  Sat Aug 24 23:53:12 2002
00008  *  Copyright  2002  Roman Dementiev
00009  *  dementiev@mpi-sb.mpg.de

00012 #include "stxxl/bits/common/utils.h"
00013 
00014 
00015 __STXXL_BEGIN_NAMESPACE
00016 
00017 template < size_t ALIGNMENT >
00018 inline void * aligned_alloc (size_t size, size_t meta_info_size = 0)
00019 {
00020     STXXL_VERBOSE1("stxxl::aligned_alloc<" << ALIGNMENT << ">(), size = " << size << ", meta info size = " << meta_info_size);
00021     char * buffer = new char[size + ALIGNMENT + sizeof(char *) + meta_info_size];
00022     char * reserve_buffer = buffer + sizeof(char *) + meta_info_size;
00023     char * result = reserve_buffer + ALIGNMENT -
00024                     (((unsigned long) reserve_buffer) % (ALIGNMENT)) - meta_info_size;
00025     STXXL_VERBOSE1("stxxl::aligned_alloc<" << ALIGNMENT << ">() address 0x" << std::hex << long (result)
00026                                            << std::dec << " lost " << unsigned (result - buffer) << " bytes");
00027     assert( int (result - buffer) >= int (sizeof(char *)) );
00028     *(((char * *) result) - 1) = buffer;
00029     STXXL_VERBOSE1("stxxl::aligned_alloc<" << ALIGNMENT <<
00030                    ">(), allocated at " << std::hex << ((unsigned long)buffer) << " returning " << ((unsigned long)result)
00031                                            << std::dec);
00032 
00033     return result;
00034 }
00035 
00036 template < size_t ALIGNMENT > inline void
00037 aligned_dealloc (void * ptr)
00038 {
00039     STXXL_VERBOSE2("stxxl::aligned_dealloc(<" << ALIGNMENT << ">), ptr = 0x" << std::hex << (unsigned long)(ptr) << std::dec);
00040     delete[] * (((char * *) ptr) - 1);
00041 }

00045 __STXXL_END_NAMESPACE
00046 #endif
